Comments_List: Writing different types of papers and providing sufficient evidence, reading and analyzing sources, and contributing to discussion with other students.
I definitely improved my writing skills because there is so much writing in this course. I also learned how to better analyze sources and how to integrate them into my writing.
I learned the structure of an academic paper and how to write concisely
Academic writing structure, style, and research
Many readings on a very interesting topic. Teaches necessary writing skills.
Strengths are interesting material and course, but very time consuming.
The strengths of this course would be that although there was so much writing, it was a really interesting subject to it was interesting to do research and write papers.
It felt somewhat disjointed at times, like we were jumping from topos to topic with no clear direction

Strengths: it makes you write a lot, forces you to do comprehensive research, and you build strong bonds with your peers

Weakness: slow grading
Yes, it is a very interesting topic so it is easy to participate in discussion and write research papers about.
I would definitely recommend this course because I felt like it really made writing interesting and I improved as a writer.
If they like the topic and really have no idea on how to write a paper, I would recommend it
Yes! Take ENGL 114, despite what grade you receive, itll prepare you to thrive in writing-oriented classes in the future
